name: PlayerAbilitiesHelper
description: The PlayerAbilitiesHelper class provides access to a player's ability settings and properties in Minecraft.
overview:
The PlayerAbilitiesHelper class provides access to a player's ability settings and properties in Minecraft. This helper allows scripts to read and modify various player abilities such as flying, creative mode, invulnerability, movement speeds, and world modification permissions. It wraps Minecraft's native PlayerAbilities class and exposes both getter and setter methods for common player ability modifications.

This class is commonly accessed through player-related events or by directly querying the player object, making it essential for scripts that need to modify or monitor player capabilities.

methods.name: getInvulnerable
methods.description: Returns whether the player is invulnerable (cannot take damage).

methods.name: getFlying
methods.description: Returns whether the player is currently flying.

methods.name: getAllowFlying
methods.description: Returns whether the player is allowed to fly (has flight capability).

methods.name: getCreativeMode
methods.description: Returns whether the player is in creative mode.

methods.name: canModifyWorld
methods.description: Returns whether the player is allowed to modify the world (place/break blocks, interact with blocks).

methods.name: getFlySpeed
methods.description: Returns the player's flying speed multiplier.

methods.name: setFlySpeed
methods.description: Sets the player's flying speed multiplier.

parameters.name: flySpeed
parameters.description: The new fly speed multiplier (typical range: 0.0 to 1.0+)

methods.name: getWalkSpeed
methods.description: Returns the player's walking speed multiplier.

methods.name: setWalkSpeed
methods.description: Sets the player's walking speed multiplier.

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: The new walk speed multiplier (typical range: 0.0 to 1.0+)

methods.name: setFlying
methods.description: Sets whether the player is currently flying.

parameters.name: flying
parameters.description: Whether the player should be flying (true) or not (false)

methods.name: setAllowFlying
methods.description: Sets whether the player is allowed to fly.

parameters.name: allowFlying
parameters.description: Whether the player should be allowed to fly (true) or not (false)
